channel.title: [HELP] With attack styles, please this is ruining my server
channel.description:
When you do an attack style it gives you the wrong experience points! :( Like when you kick it gives you defence xp heres a picture that mentions what experience it give you to the attack styles. [img]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/Help/5.png[/img]
I really need to fix this asap! So if you could help me with this, it would be great! Its ruining my server. :(
